mapper.insert: insert into user (type_no, join_type_no, user_id, user_name, user_nick, user_pw, user_phone, user_ip ) values (#{type_no}, #{join_type_no}, #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_nick}, #{user_pw}, #{user_phone}, #{user_ip})
mapper.update: update user set user_nick = #{user_nick}, user_intro = #{user_intro}, user_id = #{user_id}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, user_name = #{user_name} where user_no=#{user_no} and user_pw=#{user_pw}
mapper.delete: delete from user where user_no=#{user_no} and user_pw=#{user_pw}
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_id=#{user_id} limit 1
select * from user where user_name=#{user_name} and user_phone=#{user_phone} limit 1
select * from user order by user_no desc
